TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit PartExtensionProvider extends System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary`2<string, string>
Public NotInheritable Class PartExtensionProvider Inherits Dictionary(Of String, String)

Docs.summary: Defines a Part Extension Provider which maintains a (Content Type, Part Extension (".xml")) dictionary. Used in OpenXmlPackage derived classes.

Docs.param: The source PartExtensionProvider whose elements are copied to the new PartExtensionProvider.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the PartExtensionProvider class that contains elements copied from the specified PartExtensionProvider.

Docs.param: The initial number of elements that the PartExtensionProvider can contain.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class that is empty, has the specified initial capacity.

Public Sub AddPartExtension (contentType As String, partExtension As String)

Docs.param: Part Extension (".xml") to be used for the part with the specified content type.

MemberSignature.Value: public void MakeSurePartExtensionExist (string contentType, string partExtension);
.method public hidebysig instance void MakeSurePartExtensionExist(string contentType, string partExtension) cil managed
Public Sub MakeSurePartExtensionExist (contentType As String, partExtension As String)

Docs.param: Part Extension (".xml") to be used for the part with the specified content type.
Docs.summary: Check to make sure the (contentType, partExtension) is in the provider. The (contentType, partExtension) will be added to the provider if it does not exist in the provider.
Docs.exception: Thrown when either parameter is null.
